Hi all,


I am trying to create some BSDF (klems and tensor tree t4 ) with genBSDF. 
A detail that surprised me is the option "-geom unit_distance". Up to my 
understanding, using the same geometry at different scales shouldn't alter 
BSDF properties. If my blinds are two times bigger, the angular properties 
should not varry (excluding some randomness in the calculation). I feel 
like I have missed something that would justify including the unit 
distance if I don't want to keep the geometry.


Sincerely,
Marouane Boudhaim.
